Transcript: สวัสดีค่ะคุณนฤมล
เสื้อตาขออนุญาตเวลาไม่เกิน 2 นาทีค่ะพอดีว่ามาสอบถามข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมให้นิดนึงค่ะอันนี้คุยสายได้อยู่นะคะ
English Translation: I would like to ask permission for no more than 2 minutes. I just wanted to ask for a little more information. You can talk on the phone right now.
translate_claude: Excuse me, may I have no more than 2 minutes of your time please? I'd like to inquire for a little more information. This line is still connected.
revision_claude: Excuse me, may I have no more than 2 minutes of your time please? I'd like to inquire for a little more information. This line is still connected.

Transcript: ค่ะขออนุญาตสอบถามรายละเอียดเกี่ยวกับไทรอยด์ค่ะคุณลูกค้าตัวนี้คุณลูกค้าอ่ามีการรับประทานยาวันละกี่เม็ดคะตัวนี้วันละ 3 เม็ดเนาะ
English Translation: Yes, please allow me to ask for details about the thyroid, this customer. How many pills do you take per day? This one is 3 pills per day.
translate_claude: Excuse me, I would like to ask for details about thyroid. For this customer, how many pills does the customer take per day? For this one, it's 3 pills per day.
revision_claude: Excuse me, I would like to ask for details about thyroid. For this customer, how many pills does the customer take per day? For this one, it's 3 pills per day.

Transcript: ของค่ะอันนี้พบแพทย์อันนี้เป็นกี่เดือนครั้งคะหรือว่าทุกเดือน
English Translation: This one, how many times a month do you see this doctor? Or is it every month?
translate_claude: For this one, how often should I see a doctor for this? Monthly or every month?
revision_claude: For this one, how often should I see a doctor for this? Monthly or every month?

Transcript: มีสามีเป็นผู้รับผลประโยชน์ด้วย
English Translation: The husband is also the beneficiary.
translate_claude: Having a husband as a beneficiary as well
revision_claude: Having a husband as a beneficiary as well

Transcript: ค่ะแล้วก็อันนี้สอบถามอาชีพเพิ่มเติมค่ะคุณลูกค้าตัวนี้เป็นพนักงานบริษัทหรือว่าประกอบอาชีพอะไรไหมคะ
English Translation: Yes, and this one asks for additional occupations. Is this customer an employee of a company or what kind of occupation do you have?
translate_claude: And this is to ask for additional occupation information. Is this customer an employee of a company or what occupation do they have?
revision_claude: And this is to ask for additional occupation information. Is this customer an employee of a company or what occupation do they have?

Transcript: โอเคค่ะอันนี้ข้อมูลครบถ้วนเรียบร้อยแล้วค่ะคุณลูกค้าต้องขออภัยที่รบกวนนะคะค่ะสวัสดีค่ะ
English Translation: Okay, this one has complete information. Dear customer, I apologize for disturbing you. Hello.
translate_claude: Okay, this information is complete. I'm sorry for bothering you, dear customer. Goodbye.
revision_claude: Okay, this information is complete. I'm sorry for bothering you, dear customer. Goodbye.
